Location:
- Exterior outdoor condenser unit (Goodman), front view.

Observations:
- Cabinet with vertical louvers; front grille intact.
- Two top mounting bolts visible; badge legible.
- No visible dents, corrosion, leaks, or heavy debris.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- Routine maintenance: keep at least 24 inches of clearance around unit; remove surrounding debris/vegetation; periodically clean fins with a soft brush; have annual HVAC service to inspect wiring, refrigerant lines, and operation.
